item.description:
When: Thursday, September 16, 2010 - 7:45 am
Where: Holiday Inn at Ingleside, Holyoke, MA
$15 in advance, $18 at the door

Please RSVP by calling (413) 827-4182
or registering at our Meetup.com page.


Do you have enough clients? Do you offer samples/assessments of your product or service but then your prospect has to "think about it" before buying? What percentage of people that you market to take advantage of your free offers and what percentage become on going clients?

Handling your marketing activities is only half of the revenue equation; your sales process being the other half. Once a prospect is "interested", how do you move them along your sales pipeline and convert them into purchasing your products or services?

If you are not able to convert enough prospects into a paying clients, come be inspired and rejuvenated with practical advise on how to keep more people in your sales funnel until they are ready to buy and how to motivate more people to actually buy from you sooner.

Becky Castro, CPCC, PCC has been a certified personal and business coach for the last 10 years. Before that, she owned a graphic design company for 16 years. She is WBOA's 2010 Business Woman of the Year and her company is www.ILoveMondayMornings.com
item.name: September Breakfast Meeting: Tweak Your Sales Process so it Flows
